title: End Game
body: Does anyone else's loading take for ever after the end of game. When ever I finish a match it takes forever to load the end game lobby and it's getting pretty annoying. Wondering if anyone else is having the same issue or if its just me?

replies.body: You might have "close client during game" turned on in the client options. When that is turned on, the client closes during a game so then it needs to restart from scratch when the match ends. Try turning that off and see if you can get into the after match lobby quicker!
I have that issue too. takes 2 to 3 mins for it to be done. It annoys me but my friends don't mind waiting on me. Makes me mad cuz i don't like keeping people waiting
